TopicTitle: KSC Looks Really Blurry, how can I fix this issue?

Articles.Content: I'm playing on medium graphics with an RTX 2070, but the KSC just looks blurred. The environment also looks blurred during launch. It's not lagging much, and my fps seems to be fine, it just looks kinda blurry. What do?

I'm playing at max graphic and it's the same. Even with the antialiasing at max everything it's still blurry. Also there is some sort of haze or white fog that doesn't help either. It feels like playing a very early leaked build than an early access
